items.sentence: If we stop here, we\'ll be right back where we started!
Are you absolutely sure you want to drop out of school?
I wonder if Tom is still going to go with us on Monday.
I wonder where Tom learned how to speak French so well.
I wonder whether Tom wants to buy that for Mary or not.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet chosen a name for their baby.
On Friday nights, I often go eat pizza with my friends.
Perhaps I should take an umbrella with me just in case.
Perhaps you could suggest something we can do tomorrow.
I didn\'t think that I was going to get along with Tom.
